Class CommissionServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.elements.CommissionServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommissionService, CommissionServiceLocal, InitializingService, Service

    public class CommissionServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommissionServiceLocal, InitializingService
    Implementation for commission service
    Author:
    Jefferson Magno
